      Subinterfaces of TerminalResizeListener in com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ResizeListener
      Deprecated. 
      Use TerminalResizeListener instead
      Classes in com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal that implement TerminalResizeListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SimpleTerminalResizeListener
      This class is a simple implementation of Terminal.ResizeListener which will keep track of the size of the terminal and let you know if the terminal has been resized since you last checked.
      Methods in com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal with parameters of type TerminalResizeListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Terminal.addResizeListener(TerminalResizeListener listener)
      Adds a TerminalResizeListener to be called when the terminal has changed size.
      void IOSafeTerminalAdapter.addResizeListener(TerminalResizeListener listener) 
      void AbstractTerminal.addResizeListener(TerminalResizeListener listener) 
      void Terminal.removeResizeListener(TerminalResizeListener listener)
      Removes a TerminalResizeListener from the list of listeners to be notified when the terminal has changed size
      void IOSafeTerminalAdapter.removeResizeListener(TerminalResizeListener listener) 
      void AbstractTerminal.removeResizeListener(TerminalResizeListener listener)
